messages.title: Don't trust Theresa
messages.content: Theresa May completely failed to control immigration as Home Secretary and since she's been in government net migration has risen by more than 1.8 million people.

messages.title: WASTING YOUR MONEY ON FOREIGN AID
messages.content: She is fully committed to bingeing £14 billion a year of your money on so-called 'foreign aid'.

messages.title: EUROPEAN COURT OF HUMAN RIGHTS
messages.content: The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR. It currently stops us deporting criminals and terrorists and even makes us pay them compensation.

messages.title: BRITAIN'S FISHING WATERS
messages.content: She won't commit to protecting our fishermen from future Brussels controls.

messages.title: NHS AND SOCIAL CARE CRISIS
messages.content: Since 2010, May's Tories have paid £50 billion of EU membership fees. This money should have employed tens of thousands of nurses and carers in our NHS.

messages.title: NATIONAL SECURITY UNDERMINED
messages.content: Our police have been cut by 20,000 officers and armed forces by 30,000 since 2010.

issues.brexitEurope: May's Tories have paid £50 billion of EU membership fees.
issues.governance: The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR. It currently stops us deporting criminals and terrorists and even makes us pay them compensation.

issues.immigration: Theresa May completely failed to control immigration as Home Secretary and since she's been in government net migration has risen by more than 1.8 million people.

images.caption: Graphical representation of net migration to the UK from 2009 to 2016.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on critiquing Theresa May's policies and actions without providing specific UKIP policies or detailed stances of the candidate on various issues.
